name: Angry Birds (Opposition)
overview: How many of you remember that highly addictive game whereby you used to fling birds at collapsible objects to knock pigs out of the way? Well I do and it was the gaming fad for the time ' Angry Birds ', which isn't on anyone's mind right now as it's mostly Pokemon Go. But what if we could take Angry Birds and turn it into a shooter for the ZX Spectrum? Welcome to ' Angry Birds (Opposition) ' by kas29.
